div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1679 Toukh el Garmous, 20 km. NE of (1123) Zagazig, 1905 Burial: c. 280 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: AR. Pot hoard from chamber 2 of temple treasury, with gold ornaments (cf. nos. 1680, 1729) Ptolemy I: tetradr. (Alexander hd./Athena, bulk of hoard; Soter type, a few) Disposition: unknown Edgar, ASA 1906, p. 208
